languages.text: "Это допустимый вариант, к которому мы подготовились. Силами Адептус Администратум были реквизированы наемные войска самой высокой квалификации. В случае чрезвычайных ситуаций Лекс Империалис не воспрещает..."

traits.locale_text: "Мы можем! Силами Адептус Администратум были реквизированы наемные войска самой высокой квалификации. В случае чрезвычайных ситуаций Лекс Империалис не воспрещает..."
traits.speaker: VC_Prefect

languages.text: "That is an acceptable option — one with which we are prepared to proceed. The Adeptus Administratum has requisitioned mercenary troops of the highest calibre. Under extreme circumstances, the Lex Imperialis permits—"
languages.original_text: "Это допустимый вариант, к которому мы подготовились. Силами Адептус Администратум были реквизированы наемные войска самой высокой квалификации. В случае чрезвычайных ситуаций Лекс Империалис не воспрещает..."

"That is an acceptable option with which we are prepared to proceed. The Adeptus Administratum has requisitioned mercenary troops of the highest calibre. Under extreme circumstances, the Lex Imperialis permits—"

"That is an acceptable option — one with which we are prepared to proceed. The Adeptus Administratum has requisitioned mercenary troops of the highest calibre. Under extreme circumstances, the Lex Imperialis permits—"

"That is an acceptable option — one with which we are prepared to proceed. The Adeptus Administratum has requisitioned mercenary troops of the highest calibre. Under extreme circumstances, the Lex Imperialis permits—"

languages.text: « Il s'agit d'une option acceptable, que nous sommes prêts à mettre en place. L'Adeptus Administratum a réquisitionné des troupes de mercenaires de premier ordre. Dans les circonstances les plus extrêmes, la Lex Imperialis autorise... »
languages.original_text: "That is an acceptable option — one with which we are prepared to proceed. The Adeptus Administratum has requisitioned mercenary troops of the highest calibre. Under extreme circumstances, the Lex Imperialis permits—"

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit d'une option acceptable, que nous sommes prêts à mettre en place. L'Adeptus Administratum a réquisitionné des troupes de mercenaires de premier ordre. Dans les circonstances les plus extrêmes, la Lex Imperialis autorise... »

languages.text: «Es una opción aceptable con la que estamos dispuestos a proceder. El Adeptus Administratum ha obtenido tropas mercenarias de la mejor calidad. En circunstancias extremas, la Lex Imperialis permite...».
languages.original_text: "That is an acceptable option — one with which we are prepared to proceed. The Adeptus Administratum has requisitioned mercenary troops of the highest calibre. Under extreme circumstances, the Lex Imperialis permits—"

traits.locale_text: «Es una opción aceptable con la que estamos dispuestos a proceder. El Adeptus Administratum ha obtenido tropas mercenarias de la mejor calidad. En circunstancias extremas, la Lex Imperialis permite...».

languages.text: “这是个可以接受的选择，我们也正打算采取这样的措施。帝国内政部已经征用了技艺最为出色的雇佣兵。在极端情况下，帝国法典允许——”
languages.original_text: "That is an acceptable option — one with which we are prepared to proceed. The Adeptus Administratum has requisitioned mercenary troops of the highest calibre. Under extreme circumstances, the Lex Imperialis permits—"

traits.locale_text: “这是个可以接受的选择，我们也正打算采取这样的措施。帝国内政部已经征用了技艺最为出色的雇佣兵。在极端情况下，帝国法典允许——”

languages.text: "Das ist eine akzeptable Option ... eine Option, mit der wir fortfahren können. Das Adeptus Administratum hat bereits Söldnertruppen erster Güte requiriert. Unter extremen Umständen gestattet das Lex Imperia ..."
languages.original_text: "That is an acceptable option — one with which we are prepared to proceed. The Adeptus Administratum has requisitioned mercenary troops of the highest calibre. Under extreme circumstances, the Lex Imperialis permits—"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist eine akzeptable Option ... eine Option, mit der wir fortfahren können. Das Adeptus Administratum hat bereits Söldnertruppen erster Güte requiriert. Unter extremen Umständen gestattet das Lex Imperia ..."

languages.text: 「容認可能な選択肢です。私たちとしても、その方向で進める準備は整っています。帝国行政局は、最も腕の立つ傭兵部隊を徴用しています。極限状況下においては、レックス・インペリアが許可しています—」
languages.original_text: "That is an acceptable option — one with which we are prepared to proceed. The Adeptus Administratum has requisitioned mercenary troops of the highest calibre. Under extreme circumstances, the Lex Imperialis permits—"

traits.locale_text: 「容認可能な選択肢です。私たちとしても、その方向で進める準備は整っています。帝国行政局は、最も腕の立つ傭兵部隊を徴用しています。極限状況下においては、レックス・インペリアが許可しています—」

languages.text: "Kabul edilebilir bir seçenek. Üstelik bununla ilerlemeye hazırız. Adeptus Administratum, en yüksek kalibrede paralı asker talebinde bulundu. Olağanüstü koşullar söz konusu olduğunda Lex İmperialis buna müsaade..."
languages.original_text: "That is an acceptable option — one with which we are prepared to proceed. The Adeptus Administratum has requisitioned mercenary troops of the highest calibre. Under extreme circumstances, the Lex Imperialis permits—"
